message.body: I think I've found a bug
Let's see. I typed my current username and then my @username. muja@zeroverse.bit @muja@zeroverse.bit | muja@zeroid.bit @muja@zeroid.bit
The first pair should have been zeroverse and at zeroverse
Take a look at this paste: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?17i7Y7r8nTaCfLbCAuaKyc4R5BbKZYU2Hr_23
So it should work if we do it like @basxto @muja
Yeah, I meant so that it works with the @username thing
"please try it out soon," will do.
So only basxto will highlight it for you?
So all I need is muja@zv and this user will show up?
